p: The susceptibility to ciprofloxacin, co-trimoxazole and MUP of S. aureus isolates was assessed via disc diffusion method and interpreted according to the European Committee on Antimicrobial Susceptibility Testing (EUCAST) recommendations. MRSA phenotype was determined using cefoxitin. The presence of macrolide-lincosamide-streptogramin B (MLS B) resistance phenotype was determined using erythromycin and clindamycin in accordance with Clinical and Laboratory Standards Institute (CLSI) recommendations [ 14â€“ 17]. Antibiotic discs were provided by Diag-Med, Poland.
